import sys

N = int(input())

seats = [0 for _ in range(100001)]

for _ in range(N):
    l, r = map(int, input().split())
    seats[l] += 1
    seats[r+1] -= 1

s = 0
for i in range(100001):
    s += seats[i]
    seats[i] = s

print(max(seats))

N = int(input())

count = 0

for i in range(N):
    l, r = map(int, input().split())
    count += r-l+1

print(count)

N = int(input())

sum = 0

for i in range(N):
    l, r = map(int, input().split())
    sum += r - l + 1

print(sum)

n = int(input())
l = [0] * 100000
for i in range(n):
    l_i, r_i = map(int, input().split(" "))
    for j in range(l_i - 1, r_i):
        l[j] += 1
print(sum(l))

N = int(input())

list = []

for _ in range(N):
    l_i, r_i = map(int, input().split())
    list.append(r_i)

print(sum(list))

N = int(input())

l_r = []
for i in range(N):
    l_r.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

result = []
for i in range(N):
    result.extend(list(range(l_r[i][0], l_r[i][1] + 1)))

print(len(set(result)))
